antique.translation[0].definitions[0].de: antique furniture, jewellery etc is old and often valuable
antique.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a piece of furniture, jewellery etc that was made a very long time ago and is therefore valuable
antique.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The palace is full of priceless antiques.
They bought the clock at an antique shop in Bath.
an antique dealer  (=someone who buys and sells antiques)
